categories: Category:Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace video game voice actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode I Jedi Power Battles voice actors

nodes.text: Scott Cleverdon (born July 31, 1969) was the voice of Obi-Wan Kenobi and Nute Gunray in The Phantom Menace game. He also provided the voice for Kenobi in Star Wars: Episode I Jedi Power Battles.
